'''''Interactive Tour''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] in [[Fontaine]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Activate the "[[The Miraculous Antoine Roger Aircraft|Antoine Roger Aircraft]]" and hit 8 targets within the time limit.}}
# Activate the aircraft and complete the challenge 0/1
#* Challenge: Hit the designated number of targets
#* Beryl Region variant: Hit at least 8 out of 23 balloons within 90 seconds. The balloons appear off to the right side of the aircraft; the first 11 move vertically, alternating up and down, the first 7 of that move at set intervals whilst the next 4 move vertically at a slightly different set interval, the remaining 12 do not move and are separated into groups of 2.
#* West Slopes of Mont Automnequi variant: Hit at least 8 out of 18 balloons within 90 seconds. The balloons appear off to the left side of the aircraft; the first 9 spawn in groups of 3 that rotate periodically; the last 9 do not move.
